modName: Mage Charlies God Home Including Wands spells and more
summary:
A new GOD home for you to bulk your self up with.
Updates
06/01/14 Added some Powerful Staffs for your pleasure, Will take down most enemies in seconds if not it will set them on fire or electrocute them for 60 seconds.

06/01/14 Added some more spell books one is a basic flame but very powerful. The Other is... Well fun to
descriptionHtml:
Mage Charlie has gone away and left you in charge of his home. He has left you with what could be some of the most powerful potions & armor Skyrim has ever seen...

With a little bit of know how and some clever crafting you can have powerful armor weapons and spells all at your disposal. This may be a small home but it comes with a lot of power!

Most of the stuff in this house is over powered but that is how I wanted it to be, It is a GOD house afterall.

If any body has any Ideas let me know (no scripting). More magic!

Please Endorse if you like.
Updates

13/01/14 Added a new spell, Blizzard which last longer kills more and has fire damage. Changed the textures on the wands.
I am trying to get in my own wands into the game, Ive made a simple one in Blender but cannot for the life of me get in into Nif or Skyrim. If anyone knows how to do this and could help I would give credit.

10/01/14 Ha I figured out how to make a wand, So ive uploaded it for you. I will make some more once I figure out how to remodel the shiv. To install now just drag the both the files into the main game folder ie. D:SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrim it will ask you to merge the files say yes. Done!

09/01/14 A few tweaks here and there, Added some more spell books and some Nightingale armor with new Enchantments.

06/01/14 Added some Powerful Staffs for your pleasure, Will take down most enemies in seconds, If not one will set them on fire the other electrocute them for 60 seconds. And the Third is (which is hidden in the house) well you will find out.

06/01/14 Added some more spell books one is a basic flame but very powerful. The Other is... Well fun to use! But use it with Caution around Allies. Good for killing as well like a God.

I will try and put some more in, Just getting back into the swing of things.

Location:
Riverwood there is a fast travel marker

Fully navmeshed
Fast travel marker
Crafting area
Alchemy Area
Plenty of storage
Mannequin
Weapon plaques
Custom spell
Custom Potions

To install please place file in SteamSteamAppscommonskyrim

To uninstall please take it out.

Bugs: please let me know if you find any.

If you like please either leave comment feedback give endorsement or even take a picture in your new home and post it on here, Thank you for looking at my mod I hope you enjoy.

Credits:
BETHESDA of course

Also Available on Steam http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=210845369
author: chazzee23
